sentences.en: The company was considered as a possible subcontractor to build the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 这家公司被认为是可能制造这架飞机的分包公司。

sentences.en: Science Applications International Corp. is the subcontractor.
sentences.cn: 科学应用国际公司是子承包商。

sentences.en: The manufacture of belts and buckles is put out to subcontractor.
sentences.cn: 成带和带扣的生产，交分包商承做。
